memberdef.argsstring: (std::unordered_map< int, Coordinate > &nodeCoords, std::unordered_map< int, Coordinate > &faceCoords, std::unordered_map< int, Coordinate > &cellCoords, std::unordered_map< int, std::vector< int > > &faceNodes, std::unordered_map< int, std::vector< int > > &cellFaces, std::unordered_map< std::string, std::vector< int > > &patches, std::unordered_map< std::string, std::vector< int > > &zones)
memberdef.name: Grid

simplesect.para: Return 1, for 1d grid; 2, for 2d; 3, for 3d; others, for invalid type.

briefdescription.para: Activate the mesh to extract topological information needed for various numerical calculations.
Refine the cell at the given index for adaptive grid.

simplesect.para: The refining wouldn't change the origin nodes.

briefdescription.para: Relax the cell at the given index for adaptive grid.

simplesect.para: The coarsening wouldn't change the origin nodes.

briefdescription.para: Grid encapsulate the mesh data for numerical calculation.
